title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        C&O Canal towpath winding near the Potomac River NPS Photo   Â    The Chesapeake & Ohio Canal is rich with cultural, historical, and natural resources spanning 184.5 miles from Georgetown to Cumberland, Maryland.  News Our latest news in the form of blogs, news releases, and press kits. Photos & Multimedia  Check out breathtaking photos, videos, and mobile tours, as well our social media accounts. History & Culture The people, places, and stories of the C&O Canal have created the rich history and culture we showcase at the Park. Nature Understand the unique plants, animals, and geology along the 184.5 miles of the towpath. Education Attention teachers and students! Take a look at our innovative education programs. Kids & Youth Junior Ranger programs, as well as various kids and youth activities are sure to keep them entertained! Management For the latest regulations and Superintendent Compendium, visit our management tab.  Bookstore Our bookstores are operated by Eastern National.
